Name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
Desc: Grilled Fish doused in delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.
Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.
